Package com.github.dandelion.datatables.core.feature

Class Summary
AbstractFeature Abstract UI feature.
AjaxFeature Feature automatically added to the table when using AJAX sources.
FilteringFeature Java implementation of the DataTables Column Filter Add-on written by Jovan Popovic.
JsonpFeature Feature that is always enabled when server-side processing has been activated.
